mapper.select: SELECT id, agent_id, client_id, client_role, flow_prompt, flow_seq, create_time, update_time FROM ai_flow WHERE agent_id = #{agentId} ORDER BY flow_seq DESC, update_time DESC, id DESC
SELECT id, agent_id, client_id, client_role, flow_prompt, flow_seq, create_time, update_time FROM ai_flow WHERE agent_id = #{agentId} AND client_id = #{clientId}
SELECT id, agent_id, client_id, client_role, flow_prompt, flow_seq, create_time, update_time FROM ai_flow WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_flow (agent_id, client_id, client_role, flow_prompt, flow_seq) VALUES (#{agentId}, #{clientId}, #{clientRole}, #{flowPrompt}, #{flowSeq})
